Package com.openpayd.simplefxapi.service

Class FxService

java.lang.Object
com.openpayd.simplefxapi.service.FxService
@Service public class FxService extends Object
Service class where necessary logical operations are done in APIs.

  • Constructor Details

    • FxService

      public FxService(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate, CurrencyInMemoryRepository currencyInMemoryRepository, CurrencyApiSettings currencyApiSettings, ConversionRepository conversionRepository)
      Constructor method to inject dependencies.
      Parameters:
      restTemplate - Used for rest client.
      currencyInMemoryRepository - Used for handling currency list.
      currencyApiSettings - Used for currency API settings convert properties file to class.
      conversionRepository - Used for database operations for conversion transactions.

  • Method Details

    • getExchangeRateResponse

      public ExchangeRateResponse getExchangeRateResponse(String baseCurrency, String targetCurrency)
      Gets the rate of the target currency to the base currency.
      Parameters:
      baseCurrency - The base currency to be used in obtaining the rate.
      targetCurrency - The target currency to be used in obtaining the odds.
      Returns:
      An object consisting of the return code, the return message, and the rate.

    • getConversionResponse

      public ConversionResponse getConversionResponse(ConversionRequest conversionRequest)
      Performs the conversion and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      conversionRequest - Base amount, base currency and target currency.
      Returns:
      Response object generated according to successful and unsuccessful cases.

    • getConversionList

      public ConversionListResponse getConversionList(UUID transactionId, ZonedDateTime date, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      It obtains the information of previously made transactions according to the date or transactionId filters.
      Parameters:
      transactionId - Transaction ID of the transaction performed.
      date - The start date from which the following transactions are requested to be listed.
      pageable - It allows the transaction list to be paginated with page and size.
      Returns:
      Response object generated according to successful and unsuccessful cases.
